meanings.definition: A system that automatically sends messages to multiple email addresses on a mailing list.
meanings.sent1: The listserv helped us share information with everyone on the email list.
meanings.sent2: I joined the listserv to stay updated on the latest news and events.
meanings.sent3: The listserv decided to take a break and stop bombarding us with emails.
meanings.sent4: Her brain worked like a listserv, constantly distributing thoughts to different recipients.
meanings.sent5: The listserv functioned like a digital postman, delivering messages to all subscribers.

meanings.definition: A software program that manages email discussion groups.
meanings.sent1: Using the listserv, we could easily organize our email discussions.
meanings.sent2: The listserv software made it simple to moderate our group conversations.
meanings.sent3: The listserv program decided to go on strike and refused to handle any more emails.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a listserv, efficiently sorting and distributing information to different groups.
meanings.sent5: The listserv tool acted as a virtual secretary, handling all our email group tasks seamlessly.
